ANU.name: Zbigniew H. Stachurski
interest: Structure of solids: Theory of  atomic arrangement in ideal and real amorphous solids. Measuring atomic  arrangements in real amorphous organic, inorganic and metallic alloys. Structure and properties  of natural materials. Mechanics of composite materials: elastic and  buckling behaviour of anisotropic domes. Manufacturing of composites:  effect of vibrations on void reduction in laminated composites Fibre  reinforcement of materials: mechanical and physical properties of clay -  cellulose fibre composite Mechanics of materials: variation of strength  properties of genetically modified plants
project: Software for simulation of Ideal Amorphous Solid (IAS)
